content.question: The function <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is given by <math alttext="h of x, equals, the integral from, 1 to x, of, the natural log of open parenthesis, t times sine t, plus 5, close parenthesis, d t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>h</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> for <math alttext="1 less than or equal to x, less than or equal to 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. On what intervals, if any, is <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> decreasing?

choices.label: <math alttext="2.029 is less than or equal to x, is less than or equal to 4.413" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.029</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>4.413</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="4.323, is less than or equal to x, is less than or equal to 5.461" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.323</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>5.461</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1 is less than or equal to x, is less than or equal to 4.322" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>4.322</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="5.461 is less than or equal to x, is less than or equal to 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.461</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
There are no intervals on which <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing.

content.answer: <math alttext="4.323, is less than or equal to x, is less than or equal to 5.461" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.323</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>5.461</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 6.5: Interpreting the Behavior of Accumulation Functions Involving Area

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
